sentences: Vastake mulle kohe! - Answer me immediately!
Ta vastake küsimusele otsekoheselt. - He answered the question directly.
Ma ei tea, kuidas sellele vastake. - I don't know how to answer this.
context: The word 'vastake' is an imperative form of the verb 'vastata', meaning 'to answer'. It’s used when directly telling someone to respond or reply to something, similar to ‘answer me’ or ‘respond to this’ in English.
